creator: MoonPay
descriptionHtml:
Experience the best of Web3 using MoonPay.

Join millions of people all over the world who purchase crypto with MoonPay in a fast, easy, and secure way. With the MoonPay app, you can top up any of your wallets on the go using your favorite payment methods and keep track of all your purchases in a single place.
MoonPay allows users to buy and sell cryptocurrency using major payment methods including debit and credit card, local bank transfer, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and more. Available in more than 160 countries, Moonpay is trusted by over leading wallets, websites, and applications.

WHICH CRYPTOCURRENCIES CAN I BUY?
Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Dogecoin, Chainlink, Litecoin, Solana, Polkadot, XRP and dozens more.

Simply download the app, select a cryptocurrency from the drop-down menu of 100+ coins and enter how much you’d like to purchase in your preferred currency. Simply enter your wallet address and ensure that it's compatible with the cryptocurrency you’re purchasing.

SECURE
Your information is encrypted and all our products are built with security and privacy in mind.

U.S. RESIDENTS CAN BUY
ADA, ALGO, APT, AVAX, BAT, BCH, BNB, BTC, BUSD, CELO, DAI, DOGE, DOT, EOS, ETH, FLOW, GODS, HBAR, IMX, LINK, LRC, LTC, MAGIC, MATIC, MOB, NEAR, OMG, ORN, SHIB, SOL, STX, TUSD, USDC, USDT, VOXEL, WAXP, XLM, XTZ and ZRX

NON-U.S. RESIDENTS CAN BUY
AAVE, ADA, ALGO, APE, APT, ATOM, AVA, AVAX, AXS, BAT, BCH, BNB, BTC, BTTC, BUSD, CELO, CHZ, COMP, CUSD, DAI, DGB, DOGE, DOT, EGLD, ENJ, EOS, ETC, ETH, EURL, FIL, FUSD, GODS, HBAR, IMX, KAVA, KEY, KLAY, LINK, LOOKS, LRC, LTC, MAGIC, MANA, MATIC, MIOTA, MKR, MOB, NEAR, NIM, OKB, OM, OMG, ORN, QTUM, RFUEL, RUNE, RVN, SAND, SHIB, SNX, SOL, SRM, STMX, STX, SWEAT, TOMO, TRX, TUSD, UNI, USDC, USDT, UTK, VET, WAXP, WBTC, WETH, XEM, XLM, XNO, XRP, XTZ, ZIL and ZRX
